SEARCH
Package oop.controller

Class InventoryController

java.lang.Object
oop.controller.InventoryController
public class InventoryController extends Object
The InventoryController class manages the inventory of medications within the system. It provides functionalities to add, update, remove medications, view inventory, and handle prescription statuses. This class interacts with Excel files to persist and retrieve medication data.

    • addMedication

      public void addMedication(Scanner scanner, org.apache.poi.ss.usermodel.Sheet sheet, org.apache.poi.ss.usermodel.Workbook workbook) throws IOException
      Adds a new medication to the inventory by collecting details from the user and updating the Excel file.
      Parameters:
      scanner - the Scanner object used to read user input
      sheet - the Sheet object representing the medication data in Excel
      workbook - the Workbook object representing the Excel workbook
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs while accessing the Excel file

    • updateMedicationStock

    • updateMedicineStock

      public void updateMedicineStock(String medicationName, int addedAmount) throws IOException
      Updates the stock level of a medication by adding a specified amount.
      Parameters:
      medicationName - the name of the medication to update
      addedAmount - the amount to add to the current stock
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs while accessing the Excel file
